title: Integrated Project for Improving Ecological Literacy: Discovery Learning and SSI Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational ecology concepts (ecosystem components, biodiversity, etc.)
context.additional_context: Field investigation and solution development centered on local environmental issues (e.g., river-side trash problems).

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more regional ecosystem threats and provide scientific evidence.
Learners can write project reports proposing solutions to ecological issues using the SSI (Socio-Scientific Issues) approach.
Learners can achieve over 80% accuracy on ecological literacy assessment tools.

resources: Case study video materials on ecological problem-solving
Simple experiment kit (for soil/water quality testing)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
